channel.title: Compile Error
channel.description:
When I compile my source I get this; [code]starting... Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
My compiler path is: [code]@echo off title Your Source echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" [/code]then a whooole bunch of shit afterwards I can post if needbe.
My run.bat works fine but gets errors after time, and I'm using jre7 for the run.bat. I've tried jre7 with the compiler, and I've tried jdk1.7.0_05 but I just get the same error.
Any help is appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

When I compile my source I get this;

starting... Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . .

My compiler path is:

@echo off title Your Source echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" then a whooole bunch of shit afterwards I can post if needbe.

My run.bat works fine but gets errors after time, and I’m using jre7 for the run.bat. I’ve tried jre7 with the compiler, and I’ve tried jdk1.7.0_05 but I just get the same error.

Any help is appreciated, thanks!
